Methods

Awake()

Use this for initialization.

protected override void Awake()

CheckHideSubtitlePanel()

Checks whether the Subtitle Panel shouldnt be hidden. Hides it if no subtitles are currently on display.

public UniTaskVoid CheckHideSubtitlePanel()

Returns

UniTaskVoid

DisplaySubtitle(string, string, float)

Method to display a single line of subtitles. Use this when you need to play subtitles using custom logic and want to skip all the additional features.

public UniTaskVoid DisplaySubtitle(string message, string speaker, float displayFor)

Parameters

message string

Message (Dialogue) line to show

speaker string

Name of object which said the line (Leave empty string for none)

displayFor float

How long should this line be displayed for?

Returns

UniTaskVoid

killSubtitleById(int)

Immediately kills an active subtitle loop based on ID

public void killSubtitleById(int id)

Parameters

id int

Subtitle Session ID to be killed

playSubtitle(SubtitleData, AudioSource)

Plays a given subtitle track

public int playSubtitle(SubtitleData sD, AudioSource aS)

Parameters

sD SubtitleData

Subtitle Data file

aS AudioSource

AudioSource to playOneShot through

Returns

int

Cancellation ID of the subtitle instance
